text: Sonvico was a municipality of the district Lugano in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. On 14 April 2013, the former municipalities of Bogno, Cadro, Carona, Certara, Cimadera, Valcolla and Sonvico merged into the city of Lugano. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Former municipalities of Ticino Category:Neighbourhoods in Lugano
title: Sonvico
